title: The AI Design Paradigm
excerpt: How generative interfaces are shifting us from command-based UI to intent-based UI.
content:
We are witnessing a shift. 

For the last 30 years, we have designed interfaces based on direct manipulation. You click a button, a thing happens. 

Generative UI changes this. Now, you state an intent, and the interface constructs itself to meet that intent. This is the dawn of the 'Liquid Interface'.

title: Return of the Quiet Web
excerpt: Why specialized, smaller communities are defeating the algorithmic feeds.
content:
The algos are loud. 

But look closely at the data. Discord servers, group chats, and newsletters are growing faster than public feeds. We are retreating to cozy corners.

title: Rust is Boring Now
excerpt: And that is exactly why it is winning the infrastructure war.
content: Boring is good. Boring means stable. Boring means the hype cycle is over and the productivity cycle has begun.
